titleStmt.title: The Enochian walks with God found out by a spiritual-traveller, whose face towards Mount-Sion above was set ... : with an experimental account of what was known, seen, and met withal there, as to an essay to a further revelation of an immense and infinite latitude of God's love ... / written by Jane Lead, in this year 1694.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.
Loutherbourg, Philippe-Jacques de, 1740-1812.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by D. Edwards ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained, with slight loss of text.
Running title: A communion between the saints above and the saints below.

"P.J. de Loutherbourg" appears, printed or stamped, between author statement and imprint. Philippe-Jacques de Loutherbourg, 1740-1812 (cf. DNB, LCNAF), was an artist active in France and England 18th/19th cent.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
